scripts.clean: sudo watchman watch-del-all && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && sudo npm cache clean --force
scripts.tudo: sudo npm i && npm run clean && npm run android
scripts.all: sudo npm i && npm run clean && npx pod-install && npm run ios
scripts.apk-debug: npm run clean && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.aab-debug: npm run clean && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && cd android && ./gradlew bundleDebug && cd ..
scripts.apk-release: npm run clean && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.aab-release: npm run clean && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd ..
